author: jprendi
body:
Dear DQM-Integration community,

the addition of a new Scouting Online DQM Stream (as discussed [here](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3571) and [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1557799/contributions/6560416/attachments/3089825/5471885/ScoutingMeeting_2025June19.pdf)) lead to the preparation of a new [HLT scouting DQM online client](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48398). The new so-called `DQMOnlineScouting` requires new streamer files to run the unit tests on. In this PR, I added the streamer files specifically for that stream, updated the documentation to include this new streamer files and also added a recipe on how the streamer files were produced. 

Thanks in advance.
title: Adding streamerDQMOnlineScouting streamer files from Run392642
